app

Class SourceProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.SourceProcessor

  • public class SourceProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This layer is responsible for extracting documents from a text file, having the Indexer index them, and having the Store update its inverted index and document store.
    Author:
    David Wickizer, Zach Berman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Opus removeOpus(int opusIndex)
      Removes the specified Opus from the documentStore, updates all of the ordinal numbers of the affected Opuses within the documentStore, reserializes the updated documentStore, and updates the inverted index to match the updated documentStore.

      • extractOpus

        public Opus extractOpus(java.lang.String fileName,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String author)
        Extracts an Opus from a file and adds it to the Document Store.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to extract from
        title - The current title in the text box on the GUI
        author - The current author in the text box on the GUI
        Returns:
        The Opus

      • removeOpus

        public Opus removeOpus(int opusIndex)
        Removes the specified Opus from the documentStore, updates all of the ordinal numbers of the affected Opuses within the documentStore, reserializes the updated documentStore, and updates the inverted index to match the updated documentStore.
        Parameters:
        opusIndex - The index of the Opus to be removed
        Returns:
        The Opus that was removed

      • loadSummary

        public java.lang.String loadSummary()
        Call the loadSummaryState() methods. Used for being displayed on the GUI.
        Returns:
        The String result of the method calls

      • opusSummary

        public java.lang.String opusSummary()
        Call the opusSummaryState() methods. Used for being displayed on the GUI.
        Returns:
        The String result of the method calls
